Acanthophilus helianthi rossi.Damage Symptoms: Larvae feed inside sunflower heads causing poor seed development and reduced oil content.
Acanthophilus helianthi rossi.IPM Measures: Early sowing, removal of infested flower heads, pheromone traps.

Achaea janata.Damage Symptoms: Larvae cause severe defoliation and skeletonize leaves.
Achaea janata.IPM Measures: Hand collection, light traps, neem oil spray.

Acherontia styx.Damage Symptoms: Large caterpillars feed on foliage causing heavy leaf loss.

Adisura atkinsoni.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into pods and damage grains.

Aedes aegypti.Damage Symptoms: Vector of Dengue, Zika and Chikungunya.

Agrotis ipsilon.Damage Symptoms: Cuts seedlings at ground level during night.

Alcidodes affaber.Damage Symptoms: Larvae tunnel inside stems causing wilting and branch death.
Alcidodes affaber.IPM Measures: Pruning and destruction of infested branches.

Aleurodicus dispersus.Damage Symptoms: Honeydew secretion leading to sooty mould.

Amsacta albistriga.Damage Symptoms: Gregarious larvae cause severe defoliation, especially at early crop stages.
Amsacta albistriga.IPM Measures: Light traps, destruction of egg masses, deep ploughing.

Anarsia ephippias.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into fruits causing internal feeding and fruit drop.
Anarsia ephippias.IPM Measures: Collection and destruction of infested fruits, pruning.

Anarsia epoitas.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into shoots causing drying and dead-heart symptoms.
Anarsia epoitas.IPM Measures: Pruning and destruction of infested shoots.

Anisolabis stallii.Damage Symptoms: Irregular feeding on leaves and young seedlings.

Antestia cruciata.Damage Symptoms: Sucks sap from coffee berries causing bean deformation and yield loss.

Aphis craccivora.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking, leaf curling and virus transmission.

Apriona cinerea.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into trunk and branches weakening the plant.
Apriona cinerea.IPM Measures: Mechanical removal of grubs, plugging borer holes.

Araecerus fasciculatus.Damage Symptoms: Internal feeding of stored seeds causing quality loss.

Autographa nigrisigna.Damage Symptoms: Larvae scrape and consume leaf tissues.

Bagrada hilaris.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking causes leaf wilting, drying, and plant death.
Bagrada hilaris.IPM Measures: Early sowing, weed control, trap cropping.

Basilepta fulvicorne.Damage Symptoms: Adults feed on leaves causing irregular holes and reduced photosynthetic area.

Batocera rufomaculata.Damage Symptoms: Grubs bore into trunk and branches leading to oozing sap and branch dieback.
Batocera rufomaculata.IPM Measures: Mechanical removal of grubs, plugging holes with insecticidal cotton.

Calathus erratus.Damage Symptoms: Mostly predatory; minor damage by adults feeding on seeds.

Camponotus consobrinus.Damage Symptoms: Protects sap-sucking pests like aphids; indirect crop damage.
Camponotus consobrinus.IPM Measures: Destroy ant nests, control honeydew-producing insects.

Chilasa clytia.Damage Symptoms: Minor leaf feeding by larvae; generally non-economic.

Chilo sacchariphagus indicus.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into internodes causing dead hearts and reduced cane weight.

Conogethes punctiferalis.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into fruits and capsules causing premature drop.
Conogethes punctiferalis.IPM Measures: Removal of infested fruits, pheromone traps.

Danaus plexippus.Damage Symptoms: Larvae feed on milkweed leaves; not an agricultural pest.

Dendurus coarctatus.Damage Symptoms: Adults feed on rice stems causing dead hearts.

Deudorix (Virachola) isocrates.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into fruits and feed on seeds causing fruit rot.
Deudorix (Virachola) isocrates.IPM Measures: Bagging fruits, destruction of infested fruits.

Elasmopalpus jasminophagus.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into flower buds causing drying and bud drop.
Elasmopalpus jasminophagus.IPM Measures: Removal of affected buds, light traps.

Euwallacea fornicatus.Damage Symptoms: Adults bore into stems and branches causing wilting and fungal infection.
Euwallacea fornicatus.IPM Measures: Pruning and destruction of infested branches, sanitation.

Ferrisia virgata.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking causes leaf yellowing, stunted growth and sooty mould.
Ferrisia virgata.IPM Measures: Removal of infested plant parts, use of natural predators.

Formosina flavipes.Damage Symptoms: Larvae (wireworms) feed on roots and underground plant parts.

Gangara thyrsis.Damage Symptoms: Larvae roll and feed on leaves causing minor defoliation.

Holotrichia serrata.Damage Symptoms: Grubs feed on roots causing wilting and plant death.
Holotrichia serrata.IPM Measures: Deep summer ploughing, neem cake application.

Hydrellia philippina.Damage Symptoms: Maggots feed on leaf whorls causing whitish streaks and drying.
Hydrellia philippina.IPM Measures: Proper water management, removal of weeds.

Hypolixus truncatulus.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into stems causing wilting and reduced yield.

Leucopholis burmeisteri.Damage Symptoms: Grubs feed on roots causing drying and lodging.

Libellula depressa.Damage Symptoms: Beneficial predator feeding on mosquitoes and pests.

Lucilia sericata.Damage Symptoms: Associated with animal wounds; not a crop pest.

Melanagromyza obtusa.Damage Symptoms: Maggots feed inside pods damaging developing seeds.
Melanagromyza obtusa.IPM Measures: Early sowing, removal of infested pods.

Mylabris phalerata.Damage Symptoms: Adults feed on flowers and tender plant parts causing yield loss.
Mylabris phalerata.IPM Measures: Hand collection during early morning, field sanitation.

Oryctes rhinoceros.Damage Symptoms: Adults bore into crown causing V-shaped cuts on leaves and reduced yield.
Oryctes rhinoceros.IPM Measures: Use of pheromone traps, destruction of breeding sites.

Paracoccus marginatus.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking causes leaf curling, yellowing and sooty mould.
Paracoccus marginatus.IPM Measures: Removal of infested parts, release of parasitoids (Acerophagus).

Paradisynus rostratus.Damage Symptoms: Adults feed on leaves causing notches; larvae damage roots.

Parallelia algira.Damage Symptoms: Larvae feed on foliage causing irregular defoliation.

Parasa lepida.Damage Symptoms: Slug-like larvae feed on leaves causing severe defoliation and irritation on contact.
Parasa lepida.IPM Measures: Manual removal with gloves, pruning affected leaves.

Pectinophora gossypiella.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into bolls feeding on seeds and lint.
Pectinophora gossypiella.IPM Measures: Use of pheromone traps, destruction of crop residues.

Pelopidas mathias.Damage Symptoms: Larvae roll leaves and feed causing minor defoliation.

Pempherulus affinis.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking causes yellowing, weakening of plants and sooty mould.
Pempherulus affinis.IPM Measures: Pruning infested branches, neem oil sprays.

Pentalonia nigronervosa.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking and transmission of Banana Bunchy Top Virus.
Pentalonia nigronervosa.IPM Measures: Use of virus-free suckers, removal of infected plants.

peregrius maidis.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking causes yellowing, stunting, and transmission of viral diseases.
peregrius maidis.IPM Measures: Removal of alternate hosts, use of resistant varieties, field sanitation.

Pericallia ricini.Damage Symptoms: Larvae cause severe defoliation of leaves.
Pericallia ricini.IPM Measures: Hand picking of larvae, light traps, biological control.

Perigea capensis.Damage Symptoms: Larvae cut seedlings and feed on foliage at night.
Perigea capensis.IPM Measures: Deep ploughing, removal of weeds, use of traps.

Phenacoccus solenopsis.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking causes leaf curling, stunting, and sooty mould.
Phenacoccus solenopsis.IPM Measures: Release of parasitoids, removal of infested plants.

Phoetaliotes nebrascensis.Damage Symptoms: Chewing damage on leaves and stems.

Phthorimaea operculella.Damage Symptoms: Larvae bore into leaves and tubers.

Phyllocnistis citrella.Damage Symptoms: Serpentine leaf mines causing curling and reduced growth.
Phyllocnistis citrella.IPM Measures: Pruning infested leaves, neem oil application.

Retithrips siriacus.Damage Symptoms: Leaves turn bronze or black, curling, drying, reduced photosynthesis due to sap sucking.
Retithrips siriacus.IPM Measures: Field sanitation, removal of infested leaves, neem oil spray, conservation of natural enemies.

Streptanus aemulans.Damage Symptoms: Sap sucking causes leaf yellowing and stunting.

sustama gremius.Damage Symptoms: Larvae fold and feed on leaves.

Sylepta derogata.IPM Measures: Removal of rolled leaves, light traps.

Tanymecus indicus Faust.Damage Symptoms: Adults feed on leaves causing notches.

Xeroma mura.Damage Symptoms: Adults and larvae scrape leaf tissues causing whitish streaks, reduced photosynthesis, and stunted growth.
Xeroma mura.IPM Measures: Field sanitation, balanced fertilizer use, encouragement of natural predators.
